metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0741 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: slapd/connection.c in 389 Directory Server (formerly Fedora Directory Server) 1.3.4.x before 1.3.4.7 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop and connection blocking) by leveraging an abnormally closed connection.

notes.Note: leosilva> code is quite different in trusty than patch, probably a trick backport. ebarretto> only affects 1.3.4 and up

criterions.comment: 389-ds-base package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
